name: Stasis Land: Island Scary & Terrifying
description:
A Stasis Land is an island with no people, where nobody lives & an undiscovered island.

The many dead bodies of animals on Stasis Land.

Stasis Land sand is red, rumored to have absorbed much blood from past conquests. The lifeless trees rustle with dry breezes. Yet be ever careful, for even the water that lap at the dying tide is black. The evil of this island is ancient. Too ancient. Even for time to conquer...

It stood like an omen. Dark vibes radiating from the very shore. Trees swaying as if to warn off any who come near. Ash it was the ash of thousands of dead bodies scattered from the past.

Typically, a Stasis Land is denoted as such because it exists in a state of being abandoned.

Download it today and see what the buzz is about!
